tours.name: France, Paris
tours.description: Embark on an unforgettable journey through Paris, the City of Light, and immerse yourself in its rich history, iconic landmarks, and vibrant culture. This comprehensive tour offers a perfect blend of guided exploration and personal discovery, ensuring you experience the best that Paris has to offer.

tours.name: Italy, Rome
tours.description: Embark on a journey through the heart of ancient civilization and experience the timeless beauty of Rome. From awe-inspiring ruins to vibrant piazzas, this tour offers a perfect blend of history, culture, and breathtaking landmarks.
